name: Bronya
story: Heir apparent to the Supreme Guardian of Belobog.She possesses pride befitting of a princess, but also the determination and integrity of a soldier.

skills.name: Windrider Bullet
skills.description: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: Combat Redeployment
skills.description: Dispels 1 debuff from a single ally, increases the damage they deal, and allows them to immediately take action.

skills.name: The Belobog March
skills.description: Increases ATK and CRIT DMG of all allies

skills.name: Leading the Way
skills.description: After this character uses Basic ATK, their next action will be Advanced Forward.

skills.name: Banner of Command
skills.description: After this character uses Technique, increases all allies' ATK at the start of the next battle.

eidolons.name: Hone Your Strength
eidolons.description: When using Skill, there is a 50% fixed chance of recovering 1 Skill Point. This effect has a 1-turn cooldown.

eidolons.name: Quick March
eidolons.description: When using Skill, the target ally's SPD increases by 30% after taking action, lasting for 1 turn.

eidolons.name: Bombardment
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Take by Surprise
eidolons.description: After an ally other than Bronya uses Basic ATK on an enemy with Wind Weakness, Bronya immediately launches a follow-up attack on the target, dealing Wind DMG equal to 80% of Bronya's Basic ATK DMG. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per turn.

eidolons.name: Unstoppable
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Piercing Rainbow
eidolons.description: The duration of the DMG Boost effect placed by the Skill on the target ally increases by 1 turn(s).
